## init() function

Initialize the Jabra SDK. Entry point to being able to control Jabra hardware.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function init(config: IConfig | undefined): Promise<IApi>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  config | [IConfig](./jabra-js.iconfig.md) \| undefined | Optional configuration settings. See [IConfig](./jabra-js.iconfig.md) for more details. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[IApi](./jabra-js.iapi.md)<!-- -->&gt;

The initialized SDK object, which can be used to control Jabra hardware.

## Exceptions

If the underlying transport object (console-app or Chrome extension) fails to connect for some reason, e.g. when it's not installed on the system.
